about_the_game:
You awaken in a mysterious forest with no memories. Who are you, and why are you here? To uncover the truth hidden in this world, help the dolls with their troubles, gather ingredients, and craft special potions.

Medi-Cooker is a story-driven 2D platformer adventure set in a fairy tale-inspired world. Talk to dolls, solve their problems, and piece together the mysteries of both this world and yourself.

🌿 Explore a Storybook-Like World

Venture through forests, villages, caves, and other beautifully illustrated locations, each with its own unique atmosphere. With 11 original background tracks, immersive sound effects, and interactive objects scattered throughout the world, every place tells a story. Navigate these environments with simple jump and run mechanics.

🧸 Meet Unique Dolls

Dolls will come to you, each with their own problems and distinct personalities. Listen to their stories and choose how to help them—your decisions shape how their troubles are resolved and influence the course of the narrative.

🧪 Gather Ingredients & Make Potions

Explore various locations, interact with objects, and play mini-games to collect ingredients. In the witch’s kitchen, prepare and refine your ingredients through point-and-click interactions, adding special components as needed. Once your potion is complete, give it to a doll and watch their reaction—what will happen next?

Warning: This game contains indirect references to sensitive topics, including suicide, which may be distressing to some players.

You awaken in a mysterious forest with no memories. Who are you, and why are you here? To uncover the truth hidden in this world, help the dolls with their troubles, gather ingredients, and craft special potions.

Medi-Cooker is a story-driven 2D platformer adventure set in a fairy tale-inspired world. Talk to dolls, solve their problems, and piece together the mysteries of both this world and yourself.

🌿 Explore a Storybook-Like World

Venture through forests, villages, caves, and other beautifully illustrated locations, each with its own unique atmosphere. With 11 original background tracks, immersive sound effects, and interactive objects scattered throughout the world, every place tells a story. Navigate these environments with simple jump and run mechanics.

🧸 Meet Unique Dolls

Dolls will come to you, each with their own problems and distinct personalities. Listen to their stories and choose how to help them—your decisions shape how their troubles are resolved and influence the course of the narrative.

🧪 Gather Ingredients & Make Potions

Explore various locations, interact with objects, and play mini-games to collect ingredients. In the witch’s kitchen, prepare and refine your ingredients through point-and-click interactions, adding special components as needed. Once your potion is complete, give it to a doll and watch their reaction—what will happen next?

Warning: This game contains indirect references to sensitive topics, including suicide, which may be distressing to some players.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 Series
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

name: Medi-Cooker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 | AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You wake up in a forest with no memories. Gather ingredients, craft special potions, and help the dolls with troubles to uncover hidden secrets. Medi-Cooker is a story-driven 2D platformer adventure where you explore a Storybook-Like World, converse with dolls, and unravel the mysteries within.
